text: Voistinu, tem, kotoryye ne veruyut, sbivayut drugikh s puti Allakha, ne puskayut ikh v Zapovednuyu mechet', kotoruyu My vozdvigli dlya vsekh lyudey, nezavisimo ot togo, prozhivayut oni v ney ili kochuyut, a takzhe tem, kto zhelayet tam uklonit'sya ot istiny po nespravedlivosti, My dadim vkusit' muchitel'nyye stradaniya
